title: Prevent Frostbite Through Movement and Monitoring
brief: Specific exercises and checks to maintain circulation and prevent frostbite in extremities.
steps: Step 1: For face - twitch and wrinkle facial skin, make faces to maintain circulation, warm with mittened hands.
Step 2: For ears - wiggle and move ears, warm with hands.
Step 3: For hands - move hands inside gloves, warm by placing close to body under armpits.
Step 4: For feet - move feet and wiggle toes inside boots.
Step 5: Use buddy system - check partner's face often and have them check yours.
Step 6: If alone, periodically cover nose and lower face with mittened hand.
warnings: Loss of feeling for a short time indicates light frostbite; longer loss suggests deep frostbite.
Deep frostbite that is thawed and refrozen causes more damage than untrained people can handle.
Face and extremities are most vulnerable to frostbite.
